title: Doctor Lilith Sophia's Personnel File
content:
[[module CSS]]
@import url(https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--code/component%3Achicago-spirit/1);
[[/module]]

[[tabview]]
[[tab Staff File]]
**Name:** Doctor Lilyann Sophia (She/Her)

**Security Clearance:** 4

[[div class="grid-item"]]
[[include component:image-block name= pba9gJu.png|caption= Doctor Sophia, after having chugged an entire carafe worth of black coffee. (Art by [[*user Dino--Draws]])|width=200px|align= right]]
[[/div]]
**Department:** Ethics Committee

**Location:** Containment Area-111

**History:** Doctor Lilyann Sophia began her tenure at the Foundation at the age of 24, entering the Department of Decommissioning. She worked for three years in Decommissioning, focusing her research on decommissioning certain memetic agents and cognitohazards. Due to the ethical limitations that come with the Department, she was seen fit to be promoted to Level 3 clearance and given a position on the Ethics Committee.
----
**Words of Praise from Colleagues**

"You asked people for comments and all you got is this lousy quote" - Great Sage [[*user Ethagon]]

"There is always another option. It is death." - Crafter of Comics [[*user RosySaturniidae]]

"In this essay, I will explain why the (S)oviet (C)ommunist (P)arty is a Foundation front." - Fifth Fanatic [[*user YardBirdMe]]

"I'm not inspired to answer this question right now. Try again in ten business days." - That Motherfucker Who Lives In A Barrel [[*user diogene_s]]

"whipass nae nae baby" - Autonomous Artist [[*user LittlePengwy]]

"ew" - Whimiscal Warlock [[*user winkwonkboi]]

"picking my nose at the club sticking boogers in unattended cups" - Tenacious Technician [[*user TroutMaskReplica]]
